data.title: Montaillou by Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie
data.meta_description:
An enthralling account of daytoday life in a medieval French village. Using records gathered by the Catholic Church in its pursuit of heretics the book recreates the lives of a rich cast of village characters.


Condition : New

Author : Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie

Weight : 334

Publisher : Penguin Books Ltd

Language : English

EAN : 9780140137002

ISBN10 : 0140137009

Format : Paperback  Softback

Date of Publication : 19910725

Place of Publication : United Kingdom

Pagination : 400 Pages

Dimensions : 202 X 135 X 13
